eng: With distance learning assignments will be due at the end of our virtual class. Any assignments not completed will be homework and will be turned.
spa: Con el aprendizaje a distancia los trabajos seran entregados al final de nuestra clase virtual. Cualquier trabajo no terminado sera tarea and sera entregado.

eng: The class will meet daily from 8:45am-2:35pm Monday-Friday.
spa: La clase virtual se reunira diario de 8:45m-2:35pm Lunes-Viernes.

eng: With distance learning assignments will be due at the end of our virtual class. Any assignments not completed will be homework and will be turned.
